name: Age Guide
description: Tips and direction for each age! For the most part, this pack is the same as the original, just updated. The most notable changes from AoE to TE are as follows:$(br)$(li)Extreme reactors and Neotech have been removed and replaced with Nuclearcraft.$(li)Gendustry, AE2 stuff, as well as $(o)many$() other quality of life and performance mods added.
